lead_paragraph: A reader objects to the portrayal of Mr. Sanders as an uncompromising outsider; another says a socialist is unlikely to get the Democratic nod.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders, on the Campaign Trail
headline.print_headline: Bernie Sanders, on the Campaign Trail

snippet: A reader objects to the portrayal of Mr. Sanders as an uncompromising outsider; another says a socialist is unlikely to get the Democratic nod.
